attributes.action: remove the sign language person from all tv broadcasts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I ask the prime-minister to remove the sign language person from all televison broadcasts. Some of the sign language people are far too big and distract you from the actual programme, some of them have a great big border around them reducing the size of the picture.
Has no one thought about a new type of feature on a televison where a deaf person would press a button and the "signer" would appear, alot like subtitles.
Or at least order the removal of the oversized border they sometimes put around the screen, as i have seen on many BBC Broadcasts, most notably on the childrens channel.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
